A River Runs Through It is based on the true story of two fly fishing brothers, Norman and Paul, (Brad Pitt and Craig Sheffer) whose Reverend father (Tom Skerritt) tries to teach them life’s lessons by way of Fly Fishing. The colors will give you chills when they are accompanied by Jon Krakauer’s dramatic narration.

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The film is based on Stephen King's short story "Cat From Hell."
The short story wasn't that good, but the movie was and if you like Stephen King stories or movies, this is one you probably will like as well.<|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|>
